00025 #define UNKNOWN_ENTITY "[UNKNOWN_ENTITY]"

00028 //------------------------------------------------------------
00029 // Document-entity associations
00030 //------------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00033 void
00034 ears::EntityRep::loadAssociations( const lemur::api::Index& index )
00035 {
00036   //
00037   // Parameters
00038   //
00039   std::string associationFile = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "associationFile" );
00040   int associationFileFormat = lemur::api::ParamGetInt( "associationFileFormat", 0 );
00041   std::string entityAliasMapping = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "entityAliasMapping" );
00042 
00043   if ( associationFile.length() == 0 ) {
00044     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'associationFile' is not set";
00045     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00046   }
00047   
00048   if ( associationFileFormat == 2 || associationFileFormat == 3 ) {
00049     if ( entityAliasMapping.length() == 0 ) {
00050       LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'entityAliasMapping' is not set";
00051       exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00052     }    
00053   }
00054   
00055   
00056   // +++
00057   // Loading data from file(s)
00058   // +++
00059   ifstream inFile;
00060   EXID_T entityStr;
00061   EXID_T extEntityID;
00062   EXID_T entityAlias;
00063   lemur::api::EXDOCID_T docNO;
00064   ID_T entityID;
00065   lemur::api::DOCID_T docID;
00066   double weight;
00067   int assocNum = 0;
00068   int entityNum = 0;
00069   int docNum = 0;
00070   lemur::api::IndexedRealVector pde_sum;
00071   vector< DISTR_T > pde_tmp;
00072 
00073   //
00074   // Loading EntityAlias-EntityID mapping
00075   //
00076   if ( associationFileFormat % 4 >= 2 ) { // format: 2, 3, 6, 7
00077     LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading EntityAlias-EntityID mapping '" 
00078     << entityAliasMapping << "'";
00079     
00080     inFile.open( entityAliasMapping.c_str() );
00081     
00082     if ( inFile.is_open() ) {
00083       
00084       inFile >> entityAlias;
00085       while ( !inFile.eof() ) {
00086         inFile >> extEntityID;
00087         
00088         if ( entityAlias.length() > 0 && extEntityID.length() > 0 ) {
00089           aliasEntityID_[entityAlias] = extEntityID;
00090         }
00091         
00092         inFile >> entityAlias;
00093       }
00094       inFile.close();
00095       LOG( logDEBUG ) << aliasEntityID_.size() << " Alias-ID pairs loaded";
00096     }
00097     else {
00098       LOG( logERROR ) << "EntityAlias mapping file '" << entityAliasMapping 
00099       << "' does not exist";
00100       exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00101     }
00102   }
00103   
00104   //
00105   // Loading Document-Entity associations
00106   //
00107   LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading Entity-Document associations '" 
00108   << associationFile << "'";
00109   
00110   inFile.open( associationFile.c_str() );
00111   
00112   if ( inFile.is_open() ) {
00113     
00114     if ( associationFileFormat % 2 == 0 ) // format: 0, 2, 4, 6
00115       inFile >> docNO;
00116     else // format: 1, 3, 5, 7 
00117       inFile >> entityStr;
00118     
00119     while ( !inFile.eof() ) {
00120 
00121       if ( associationFileFormat % 2 == 0 ) // format: 0, 2, 4, 6
00122         inFile >> entityStr;
00123       else // 1, 3, 5, 7 
00124         inFile >> docNO;
00125 
00126       if ( associationFileFormat >= 4 ) // format: 4, 5, 6, 7
00127         inFile >> weight;
00128       else
00129         weight = 1.0;
00130                                 
00131       docID = index.document( docNO );
00132       if ( docID > 0 && weight > 0.0 ) {
00133         if ( associationFileFormat % 4 >= 2 ) { // format: 2, 3, 6, 7
00134           extEntityID = this->entityIDfromAlias( entityStr );          
00135           LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "ENTITY ALIAS '" << entityStr << "' => ENTITY '"
00136           << extEntityID << "'";
00137         }        
00138         else { // format: 0, 1, 4, 5
00139           extEntityID = entityStr;          
00140         } 
00141         
00142         // get internal entityID
00143         entityID = this->entityID( extEntityID );
00144         // new (unseen) entityID
00145         if ( entityID < 0 ) {          
00146           entityID = entityNum;
00147           intEntityID_[extEntityID] = entityID;
00148           extEntityID_.push_back( extEntityID );
00149           entityNum++;
00150         }
00151         
00152         //
00153         // store document-entity association
00154         //
00155         bool wasAssoc = false; // docID-entityID association already existed
00156         if( pde_sum.size() <= entityID )
00157           pde_sum.resize( entityID + 1 );
00158 
00159         if ( assocIndex_ == aiENTITY ) {
00160           if ( pde_tmp.size() <= entityID )
00161             pde_tmp.resize( entityID + 1 );
00162           if ( pde_tmp[entityID][docID] > 0 ) {
00163             wasAssoc = true;
00164             LOG( logWARNING ) << "ENTITY '" << extEntityID 
00165               << "' and DOC '" << docNO 
00166               << "' already have an association; using first occurrence.";
00167           } else {
00168             pde_tmp[entityID][docID] = weight;
00169             pde_sum.IncreaseValueFor( entityID, weight );
00170           }
00171         }
00172         if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {
00173           if ( pde_tmp.size() <= docID ) {
00174             pde_tmp.resize( docID + 1 );
00175             docNum = docID + 1;
00176           }
00177           if ( pde_tmp[docID][entityID] > 0 ) {
00178             wasAssoc = true;
00179             LOG( logWARNING ) << "ENTITY '" << extEntityID 
00180               << "' and DOC '" << docNO 
00181               << "' already have an association; using first occurrence.";
00182           } else {
00183             pde_tmp[docID][entityID] = weight;
00184             pde_sum.IncreaseValueFor( entityID, weight );
00185           }
00186         }
00187 
00188         if ( !wasAssoc ) {
00189           assocNum++;
00190           
00191           // number of documents associated with the entity
00192           if ( nd_.size() <= entityID )
00193             nd_.resize( entityID + 1, 0 );
00194           nd_[entityID]++;
00195           
00196           // number of entities associated with the document
00197           if ( ne_.size() <= docID )
00198             ne_.resize( docID + 1, 0 );
00199           ne_[docID]++;
00200         } // !wasAssoc
00201                 
00202         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "ENTITY: '" << extEntityID << "' (ID " << entityID
00203           << ")   DOC: '" << docNO << "' (ID " << docID << ")   WEIGHT: "
00204           << weight;      
00205       } // docID > 0 && weight > 0.0
00206       else {
00207         if ( !(docID > 0) )
00208           LOG( logWARNING ) << "Document '" << docNO << "' does not exist "
00209             << "in index (association ignored)";
00210         if ( !(weight > 0.0) )
00211           LOG( logWARNING ) << "Association (" << docNO << "-" << entityStr 
00212             << ") with 0.0 weight (ignored)";
00213       }
00214       
00215       if ( associationFileFormat % 2 == 0 ) // format: 0, 2, 4, 6
00216         inFile >> docNO;
00217       else // format: 1, 3, 5, 7 
00218         inFile >> entityStr;
00219     
00220     } // !inFile.eof()
00221     inFile.close();    
00222 
00223     LOG( logDEBUG ) << entityNum << " unique entities";
00224     LOG( logDEBUG ) << assocNum << " document-entity associations";
00225     
00226     //
00227     // normalize associations
00228     // p(d|e) = assoc(d|e) / \sum_d'[ assoc(d'|e) ]
00229     // 
00230     LOG( logINFO ) << "Normalizing Entity-Document associations";
00231     int nAssocNum = 0;
00232     
00233     // document-oriented storage
00234     if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {
00235       pde_.resize( docNum );
00236 
00237       for ( ID_T nDocID = 1; nDocID < pde_tmp.size(); nDocID++ ) {
00238         DISTR_T npde = pde_tmp[nDocID];
00239         if( npde.size() > 0 ) {
00240           for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator nit = npde.begin(); nit != npde.end(); nit++ ) {
00241             int nEntityID = nit->first;
00242             double nWeight = ((double) nit->second) 
00243                              / ((double) pde_sum.FindByIndex(nEntityID)->val);
00244             pde_[nDocID][nEntityID] = nWeight;
00245             nAssocNum++;
00246           }
00247           pde_tmp[nDocID].clear();
00248         }
00249       }
00250     }
00251         
00252     // entity-oriented storage
00253     if ( assocIndex_ == aiENTITY ) {
00254       pde_.resize( entityNum );
00255 
00256       for ( ID_T nEntityID = 0; nEntityID < pde_tmp.size(); nEntityID++ ) {
00257         DISTR_T npde = pde_tmp[nEntityID];
00258         for ( DISTR_T::const_iterator nit = npde.begin(); nit != npde.end(); nit++ ) {
00259           int nDocID = nit->first;
00260           double nWeight = ((double) nit->second)
00261                            / ((double) pde_sum.FindByIndex(nEntityID)->val);
00262           pde_[nEntityID][nDocID] = nWeight;
00263           nAssocNum++;
00264         }
00265         pde_tmp[nEntityID].clear();
00266       }
00267     }
00268 
00269     pde_tmp.clear();
00270     pde_sum.clear();
00271     
00272     LOG( logDEBUG ) << nAssocNum << " associations after normalization";
00273     
00274   } // inFile.open()
00275   else {
00276     LOG( logERROR ) << "Association file '" << associationFile << "' does not exist";
00277     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00278   }
00279   
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 
00285 const ears::DISTR_T& 
00286 ears::EntityRep::entityDocs( const ID_T& entityID ) const
00287 {
00288   // entity-oriented storage
00289   if ( assocIndex_ == aiENTITY ) {  
00290     if ( entityID >= 0 && entityID < pde_.size() ) 
00291       return pde_[entityID];
00292     else {
00293       LOG( logERROR ) << "Reference to non-existing entity";
00294       exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00295     }  
00296   }
00297 
00298   // document-oriented storage
00299   if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {
00300     LOG( logERROR ) << "This operation is not supported "
00301       << "in document-oriented storage mode";
00302     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00303 
00304     /*
00305     // TODO 
00306     // associations could be returned by iterating over documents
00307     // and assessing for each whether the entity is associated with it
00308      
00309     DISTR_T pde_temp;
00310     DISTR_T::iterator pde_it;
00311      
00312     for ( ID_T docID = 0; docID < pde_.size(); docID++ ) {
00313       pde_it = pde_[docID].find( entityID );
00314       if ( pde_it != pde_[docID].end() )               
00315         pde_temp[docID] = pde_it->second;
00316     }
00317 
00318     return pde_temp;
00319     */    
00320   }
00321 }
00322 
00323 
00324 
00326 const ears::DISTR_T& 
00327 ears::EntityRep::docEntities( const ID_T& docID ) const
00328 {
00329   // document-oriented storage
00330   if ( assocIndex_ == aiDOCUMENT ) {  
00331     if ( docID > 0 && docID < pde_.size() ) 
00332       return pde_[docID];
00333     else {
00334       // document might exist but without associatons;
00335       // return docID=0, i.e., no associations
00336       return pde_[0];
00337     }  
00338   }
00339   else {
00340     LOG( logERROR ) << "This operation is not supported "
00341       << "in entity-oriented storage mode";
00342     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );        
00343 
00344     /*
00345     // TODO 
00346     // associations could be returned by iterating over entities
00347     // and assessing for each whether the document is associated with it
00348      
00349     DISTR_T pde_temp;
00350     DISTR_T::iterator pde_it;
00351      
00352     for ( ID_T entityID = 0; entityID < pde_.size(); entityID++ ) {
00353       pde_it = pde_[entityID].find( docID );
00354       if ( pde_it != pde_[entityID].end() )               
00355         pde_temp[entityID] = pde_it->second;
00356     }
00357      
00358     return pde_temp;
00359     */        
00360   }  
00361 }

00365 //------------------------------------------------------------
00366 // Summary counts
00367 //------------------------------------------------------------
00368 
00370 const int 
00371 ears::EntityRep::entityNum() const
00372 {
00373   return nd_.size();
00374 }
00375 
00376 
00377 
00379 const int 
00380 ears::EntityRep::entityDocNum( const ID_T& entityID ) const
00381 {
00382   if ( entityID >= 0 && entityID < nd_.size() ) 
00383     return nd_[entityID];
00384   else {
00385     return 0;
00386   }
00387 }
00388 
00389 
00390 
00392 const int 
00393 ears::EntityRep::docEntityNum( const lemur::api::DOCID_T& docID ) const
00394 {
00395   if ( docID >= 0 && docID < ne_.size() ) 
00396     return ne_[docID];
00397   else {
00398     return 0;
00399   }
00400 }

00402 
00403 //------------------------------------------------------------
00404 // Conversion between entity IDs
00405 //------------------------------------------------------------
00406 
00408 const ears::ID_T 
00409 ears::EntityRep::entityID( const EXID_T& extEntityID ) const
00410 {
00411   std::map< EXID_T, ID_T >::const_iterator it = intEntityID_.find( extEntityID );
00412   if ( it != intEntityID_.end() ) 
00413     return it->second;
00414   else 
00415     return -1;
00416 }
00417 
00418 
00419 
00421 const ears::EXID_T 
00422 ears::EntityRep::entityID( const ID_T& intEntityID ) const
00423 {
00424   if ( intEntityID < extEntityID_.size() ) 
00425     return extEntityID_[intEntityID];
00426   else 
00427     return UNKNOWN_ENTITY;
00428 }
00429 
00430 
00431 
00433 const ears::EXID_T  
00434 ears::EntityRep::entityIDfromAlias( const EXID_T& entityAlias ) const
00435 {
00436   std::map< EXID_T, EXID_T >::const_iterator it = aliasEntityID_.find( entityAlias );
00437   
00438   if ( it != aliasEntityID_.end() ) 
00439     return it->second;
00440   else 
00441     return UNKNOWN_ENTITY;
00442 }
